description: Description of probability models. Generating functions & transforms. Limit laws. Markov chains in discrete & continuous time. Stochastic models in epidemics, finance, population biology, genetics, reliability & telecommunications. Simulation methods. Markov chain Monte Carlo. Inference for stochastic processes. Stationary processes. Time series.
prerequisites: Permission of Head of School + Head of School + MATH2000 + STAT2003
